name: BBCR Older versions archive
description:
Whenever BBCR gets updated, the version before the update gets removed from the page, so I'm archiving them to prevent them from getting lost. Unfortunately, I only have the Windows files, but I hope it'll suffice.

If you're looking for the current version, go here: https://basically-games.itch.io/baldis-basics-classic-remastered.
